project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV Files
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a CSV file, calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for specified numerical columns.

task.name: Implement Mean Calculation for Numerical Columns
Implement Median Calculation for Numerical Columns
Implement Mode Calculation for Numerical Columns
Implement User Input Handling for Column Selection
Write tests for each of the implemented calculations and user input handling
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
